turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: hi, how can i help you today.

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Hi. I'd like to place an order for three large pizzas, two of them with extra cheese and a third one with bacon. All three of them would be need to be gluten-free crustless.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: sure, let's make that order. where did you want to order from?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: I'd like to order from Bella Luna.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: sounds good and what was that order again?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Three large pizzas with gluten free crust. Two of them with extra cheese and one of them with bacon.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: you want 3 large pizzas, with gluten free crust, 2 with extra cheese and 1 with bacon.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: the total for your order will be $44.92 and will take about 25 minutes to be ready for pick up.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: did you want to place the order now?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Yes, go ahead and order. Thank you.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: the order has been placed. the card on file has been charged.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: anything else i can help with?

turns.text: That's it for today. Thank you for your help.
